summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.8 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 101 m) and rainfall (down 0.8 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in rainfall (down 0.7 mm), cloud levels (up 1688 m), feels like temperature (up 2.1°C), and outside temperature (up 2.7°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; you can expect comfortable, mild temperatures. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced and very little to no wind will be present. Possible light showers, occasional overcast conditions, and the light is absent. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
